original_text: And the border was drawn thence, and compassed the corner of the sea southward, from the hill that lieth before Bethhoron southward; and the goings out thereof were at Kirjathbaal, which is Kirjathjearim, a city of the children of Judah: this was the west quarter.
korean_text: 벧 호론 앞 남쪽 산에서부터 서쪽으로 돌아 남쪽으로 향하여 유다 자손의 성읍 기럇 바알 곧 기럇 여아림에 이르러 끝이 되나니 이는 서쪽 경계며

sentences.original_text: And the border was drawn thence
and compassed the corner of the sea southward
from the hill that lieth before Bethhoron southward
and the goings out thereof were at Kirjathbaal
a city of the children of Judah
